scripts.build:backend: PIPENV_VENV_IN_PROJECT='1' pipenv sync && pipenv run python manage.py migrate && pipenv run python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && touch uwsgi.ini
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others -n "py,scss,wp" -c "gray,green.inverse,blue.inverse" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:scss" "npm run dev:webpack"; exit 0
scripts.build: npm run build:scss && npm run build:webpack && npm run build:backend
